metadata.title: CVE-2022-48712 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ext4: fix error handling in ext4_fc_record_modified_inode()Current code does not fully takes care of krealloc() error case, whichcould lead to silent memory corruption or a kernel bug.  This patchfixes that.Also it cleans up some duplicated error handling logic from variousfunctions in fast_commit.c file.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
